document.full_text: hewlett-packard co is expanding a voluntary recall of notebook computer batteries due to risk of fire from overheating, the company and the u.s. consumer product safety commission said on friday.
document.title: hp expands recall of laptop batteries
lines_and_colors: hewlett-packard co is expanding a voluntary recall of notebook computer batteries due to risk of fire from overheating, the company and the u.s. consumer product safety commission said on friday.
